'''0.981<ref>{{link |url=https://kulttuuri.tumblr.com/post/22602267245/development-progress-update|title=Development Progress Update |website=Tumblr |date=May 7, 2012|author=Aleksi Postari}}</ref>''' is a minor update to MinecraftEdu, which adds support to [[1.2.5]], [https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/worldedit WorldEdit], improved skins, new panel information, shortcuts menus, and more. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.2.5]].

== Additions ==
=== General ===
* Performance improvements. "Canâ€™t keep up" errors should be mostly fixed.
* WorldEdit integration & latest WorldEdit is now shipped with [[MinecraftEdu]].{{Info needed}}
* Added new shortcuts menu, so the player can bind some commands & menus to be opened with certain keys.
* Custom texturepack support for maps.{{Info needed}}
* Improvements to graphical user interfaces.
* New skins & all the old skins have been improved.
